This game is good fun if you like to hide and complete objectives, as the killer(human controlled) tries to hunt you down and kill you. The humans must fix 5 out of 6 generators, to power the exit gate and escape, the killer must kill all 4 humans, and also slow down generator repairs by damaging them(optional). 
They have mini events for special holidays like Christmas or Halloween. 
The game tends to be human sided, and average team of humans can win vs 60% of killers, but a pro team and there are many(ie friends that play togeter all the time) quickly master kiting the killer and then basicly becomes 95% win for humans.

It's a very fun game to enjoy and is an especially fun game to play with friends. It was never really scary to me and felt more like a live strategy game in which you have to coordinate and strategize in order to be the best survivor/killer you can be; there are some truly tense moments as survivors start becoming fewer in number. Unfortunately the game does become stale after 50 or so hours due to the lack of gamemodes and is the same repair all five generators romp with different killers thrown in to add some amount of variety to the formula. I would love to see a gamemode with multiple killers so that way I can cooperate with friends and not always have to play alone. For the pricepoint though, I can definitely recommend it for a fun, horror themed multi-player strategy game.
Really cool game, even thought sometime it has bug but it's like all the games out there. Anyways, it's nice to in solo and with other people I had some really nice time

Amazing game. If you love toxicity, then this is the game for you. This game makes people's blood boil, so if you know yourself to be cool headed, but enjoy drinking the tears of others, then you've found yourself a new great game!
buy on sale never buy at full price still an awesome game.

I have been playing DbD for about 3 years now on and off. I enjoy it a lot, we'll play SWF for a few weeks straight and then not play for a couple of weeks again. Every time we got back on the game something is added or something changed and it makes it seem new again. Looking forward to the Silent Hill DLC, it'll be the second one I bought (first one was SAW)
sucks with lag, otherwise really fun
Otimo jogo no geral, fica melhor depois de 40-50 horas, apos aprender a jogar.

EDIT BELOW: This is a very fun game that feels like it will never get old. There is a huge variety of play styles created by combining game changing perks and the devs are always working on DLCs, bug fixes, and new characters.
There are in game micro-transactions and characters that do not come with the game have to be purchased, although some can be purchased with in game currency. All other payed items are purely cosmetic.

EDIT: since this review, the DEVs have drastically changed their operations and outlook on the game, they have abandoned all transparency and the game is experiencing worsening performance due to the terrible programming. The game play has changed a lot and with those changes came new bugs and broken game play mechanics. It has become the meta to run straight to a corner of the map and not even play pallets because the pallet play sucks now both for killer and for survivor. I am on my final straw for this game as the only way for me to have fun is to play the game in a way the devs did not intend (stupid builds with a squad while not caring about gens).

If you want to waste your time, buy this game.
